mapper.select:
SELECT A.i_user, B.profile_img, A.i_board, B.nick, A.title, A.post, A.addr, A.road, A.r_dt, A.ctnt, A.hits, C.cg_nm, A.price, ifnull(D.cnt, 0) as tolike, B.grade, CASE WHEN E.i_board IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS is_tolike, A.thumImage, A.image_1, A.image_2, A.image_3, A.image_4, A.image_5 FROM t_board A
LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN( SELECT i_board, COUNT(i_board) as cnt FROM t_board_like WHERE i_board = #{i_board} GROUP BY i_board )D ON A.i_board = D.i_board
LEFT JOIN t_category C ON A.i_cg = C.i_cg
LEFT JOIN t_board_like E ON A.i_board = E.i_board AND E.i_user = #{i_user} WHERE A.i_board = #{i_board}

SELECT B.i_user, A.i_board, A.thumImage, A.i_board, A.title, A.price, SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.addr," ",3) AS addr, SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.r_dt," ",1) AS r_dt FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_board_like B ON A.i_board = B.i_board WHERE B.i_user = #{i_user}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_like i_user, i_board VALUES (#{i_user}, #{i_board})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE i_board = #{i_board}
UPDATE t_board SET title = #{title}, i_cg = #{i_cg}, post = #{post}, addr = #{addr}, road = #{road}, price = #{price}, ctnt = #{ctnt} WHERE i_board = #{i_board}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board_like WHERE i_user = #{i_user} AND i_board = #{i_board};
